casebody.data:
FRIDAY INVESTMENTS, LLC, Plaintiff,
v.
BALLY TOTAL FITNESS OF THE MID-ATLANTIC, INC. f/k/a Bally Total Fitness of the Southeast, Inc. f/k/a/ Holiday Health Clubs of the Southeast, Inc. as successor-in-interest to Bally Total Fitness Corporation; and Bally Total Fitness Holdings Corporation, Defendants. No. COA15-822. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. June 7, 2016.

CASE REPORTED WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Dismissed.
